sentences.sentence: It was his brass andiron knob!
She soliloquized, "Oh, if I only had a brass andiron-knob again!"
sentences.translation: 她自言自语地说：“啊，要是我能再得到一个柴架上的铜把手就好了！”

sentences.sentence: The andiron fire has life, the warmth isn't only a kind of feeling but also a kind of emotion.
sentences.translation: 壁炉的火是有生命的，温暖不仅是一种感受，更是一种情。
